modName: Jon Snow follower from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: A new standalone follower inspired to Jon Snow character from the HBO tv series, is wearing.. and is equiped.. with his proper armor and sword, i hope you enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b] [/b][/size][b][center][size=5]              JON SNOW Game of Thrones FOLLOWER

[size=3]JOn is now a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.

Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Longclaw Jon Sword.
Location : Riverwood Inn
Combat Style : Boss 1H
[size=2][size=3]..and is unkillable
[size=5][b][size=3][size=4]AS ALWAYS..REPORT ME ANY ISSUE..THANK YOU!
[color=#00ff00]HIGHLY RACCOMANDED - Face Light by [b]tktk[/b][/color] here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?
[size=3][Credit]
[size=2][size=3]
